com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Interface CRServo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DcMotorSimple, HardwareDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CRServoImpl, CRServoImplEx

    public interface CRServo
extends DcMotorSimple
    CRServo is the central interface supported by continuous rotation servos

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple

        DcMotorSimple.Direction

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice

        HardwareDevice.Manufacturer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServoController getController()
      Returns the underlying servo controller on which this servo is situated.
      int getPortNumber()
      Returns the port number on the underlying servo controller on which this motor is situated.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple

      • Methods inherited from interface com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice
